Name: Truth: Disorder II
About the game: Continuation of the favorite of many visual novels Truth: Disorder. This time you will feel yourself in the role of the captain of the spacecraft of the future and plunge into computer simulations. The second part also reveals and complements the plot of the first. Features: - Deep and unique story. - 3 stories will tell you about the first part, the mysterious school of death and mystical detective. - Good musical accompaniment. - Nice graphics. - Visual novel with JRPG elements.
Meta Title: Truth: Disorder II: May 2, 2018, JustE A and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Truth: Disorder II? Check out the release date (May 2, 2018), developer insights from JustE A, and a complete game summary.
